name: Vaporeon Star
author: Masakazu Fukuda

poke_power.name: Blue Ray
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Vaporeon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.
